Articles.Content:
Hey there, I've kicked my development into high gear, and I had noticed my models had more faces*more round* than kerbal's stock parts.

How many faces are in the cylinder's side?

Thanks!

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Part_Modelling_Guidelines

That page it pretty old now, but it says 18 faces for 1.25m parts, and 24 for 2.5m parts, if I'm reading it right. You can always check by counting the sides yourself though!

The stock cylindrical parts all have 24 sides regardless of diameter, with the exception of the ones that were once part of the C7 aerospace pack. Those are 18 sided.

It's also worth mentioning that ALL the cylindrical parts have a 12 sided collision mesh, including C7s.
